r.s: Wrapper for the Sodium cryptographic library
r.d: A simple, low-level PHP extension for libsodium.
r.n: - Added crypto_aead_aes256gcm_*() - Added crypto_box_seed_keypair() - Added crypto_sign_ed25519_sk_to_curve25519() and crypto_sign_ed25519_pk_to_curve25519() - Added compare() - On PHP7, make memzero() and increment() avoid zeroing an object if it is not a reference or if its reference count is > 1
